tender.title: Procurement, Commercial and Sustainable Training Framework
tender.description: Scottish Government has the requirement to place a Procurement Commercial and Sustainability Training Framework on behalf of the Scottish Ministers to support the professionalisation of public procurement in Scotland.

lots.title: Procurement and Commercial Training
lots.description:
The Scottish Procurement and Property Directorate (SPPD) has a requirement to place a Procurement Commercial and Sustainability Training Framework on behalf of the Scottish Ministers to support the professionalisation of public procurement in Scotland.
SERVICES REQUIRED:
We are placing a training and development framework to provide Scottish Government and other public bodies in Scotland with tailored learning and development, grounded in the Scottish public procurement context, to build capability in the following areas.
Lot 1: Procurement and Commercial
Public procurement skills across a broad range of topics covering goods, services and works, including current legislation and policy relevant to Scotland, building commercial acumen, and procurement and supply chain specialisms.

renewal.description: Option to extend by two 12-month periods.

lots.title: Sustainable and Climate Procurement Training
lots.description:
The Scottish Procurement and Property Directorate (SPPD) has a requirement to place a Procurement Commercial and Sustainability Training Framework on behalf of the Scottish Ministers to support the professionalisation of public procurement in Scotland.
SERVICES REQUIRED:
We are placing a training and development framework to provide Scottish Government and other public bodies in Scotland with tailored learning and development, grounded in the Scottish public procurement context, to build capability in the following areas.
Lot 2: Sustainable and Climate Change Procurement Training
Public procurement skills specifically related to the Sustainable Procurement Duty and its associated tools and guidance under the Procurement Reform (Scotland) Act 2014 (and any subsequent legislation), with particular regard to improving procurement capability and embedding sustainability into procurement processes.

renewal.description: Option to extend by two 12-month periods.

tender.title: Aberdeen South Harbour Border Force Facility
tender.description:
The ITT is for the construction of a new facility for Border Force UK freight examination and staff accommodation at Aberdeen South Harbour.
The works are to provide a single storey office facility and freight examination shed with associated external works and service connections.
